commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Let Relaunch TextMate preserve session state (if disabled)

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Using Paste Online without a settings file could error
commits.body: The function to load the saved choice would return a non-compatible choice when there was no choice stored. If the user didn’t change the selection in the dialog, this default choice would be used and cause an exception.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Minimize AppleScript used in Paste Online
commits.body: This fixes an issue in Mavericks where you would be asked for the locations of missing applications. AppleScript use has been seriously curtailed to what was absolutely necessary which speeds up the command considerably. For now Colloquy, iChat, and Adium support have been removed but they may return.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: As the website shutdown a while ago.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Display upgrade message on <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌘Q</kbd> for outdated versions
commits.body: Because of an error in the upgrade mechanism of a recent nightly build it would not check for updates for the application but would still check for bundle updates. This command will prompt users with outdated versions to check manually for an update.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match default text color and size to theme

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Strip leading space from RTF copied text

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Use new variables to get font and theme location

commits.author: tim bates
commits.summary: Add Copy to RTF command – <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃⌥⌘C</kbd>
commits.body: Based on code from Brad Choate, originally written by Max Muermann and improved by Nic Williams.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body:
This command does not understand delta property lists nor know about TM 2 bundle locations.

If you want to review bundle item shortcuts then use Bundles → Select Bundle Item…

commits.author: Josh Goebel
commits.summary: pastie.org is the canonical domain name going forward - others may be completely depreciated in the future
